realfooding.desc: We transformed a health movement into one of the most impactful Food & Beverage brands, Realfooding. We launched more than 10 food products, with distribution in the largest national retail chains, and we were in charge of the entire process, from product ideation to packaging and business development.

hubrock.desc: Product design and IT development of an innovative platform aimed at fostering collaboration between established companies and startups through challenges. A project made for the Chamber of Commerce.

shukran.desc: Rebranding, content strategy and brand positioning for one of the most promising up-and-coming brands in the Spanish foodtech industry.

myrealfood.desc: Product design & management of one of the leading nutrition apps, with more than 2 million active users.
